BodyName: Committee on Civil Service and Labor

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative of the city of New York, in relation to precluding all uniformed city agencies from mandating that their employees comply with a uniform code that would require such person to violate or forego a practice of his or her creed or religion.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Precluding all uniformed city agencies from mandating that their employees comply with a uniform code that would require such person to violate or forego a practice of his or her creed or religion.

Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to extending health insurance coverage to the surviving spouse or surviving domestic partner of city retirees.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Extending health insurance coverage to the surviving spouse or surviving domestic partner of city retirees.
